tool_description: Compares multiple translations of the same sacred text passage side by side with linguistic analysis.

passage_reference.description: Standard citation reference for the passage

error_messages: Invalid passage reference: Provide a valid citation reference.
Tradition not recognized: Specify a supported religious tradition.
Translation versions unavailable: One or more requested translations are not available.
usage: Provide passage_reference and tradition; optionally specify translation_versions array. Returns side-by-side comparison of different translations with analysis.

key_differences.description: Analysis of major differences between translations
